reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater beautiful, soft, and comfortable, noting it's not itchy at all and has a nice weight.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Staple sweater
items.body: This is a sweater I would buy over and over. It’s buttery soft. Very good quality. Has a good thickness to it. The oversized fit is perfect. 100% worth the money and will be the perfect classic sweater year over year. Read more
items.author: Shannon Sackrison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Stylish
items.body: Took a chance on this sweater. I'm glad I did. It's roomy but not too big -- true to size. It's soft and very stylish despite the basic colors. I purchased a second in a different color. I wish it came in a few more colors. It looks great with jeans as well as casual dress pants. Easy to accessorize. It's held up well in the wash without pilling or snagging. Read more
items.author: Steffie R.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great color
items.body: Not as soft as I had hoped. Color and quality is nice. I’ll keep it Read more
items.author: C. Talbott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is very comfortable and looks great
items.body: Love this sweater. So soft and lightweight Read more
items.author: Smitty

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love this, but…
items.body: While the color was amazing, the ribbed collar separated from the rest of the sweater the first day I wore it. I was walking around work with what amounted to a big hole in the sweater. Not sure if it was a fluke or an indication of the overall quality of the product, but I was disappointed it didn’t work out. The color was gorgeous, the knit was soft, and it ran slightly large, which I loved. It could have been a quality purchase, but I had to return. Read more
items.author: CLL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So beautiful. Runs big
items.body: Very soft and beautiful. Not thin. Nice weight. Only thing is it was too big so my suggestion is size down or order normal size for oversized fit. Read more
items.author: Candice Jordan

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Loved until it came apart (poorly made)
items.body: Great sweater, great price. But......the arm literally detached, so it's in the garbage now. I didn't realize it was poorly made until the second time warn and the threading came loose. Bummer because it was a nice sweater. Read more
items.author: Aimee R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased!
items.body: I bought this sweater in the light brown shade first and was very happy with it. I got a medium (I'm 5'1" and 111 pounds) and it was a bit big but I don't like tight clothing. I was hesitant to buy the purple because the picture made it appear darker than what I wanted. It arrived today and I'm even happier - it's more of a light lavender, which is what I really wanted. Strangely, though, I ordered a small in this one and it's a tad bigger than the medium. But I have washed the medium (in a laundry bag in cold water and hung it to dry) so maybe it shrank just a tad. Well worth the money. They are very soft and I love the higher crew neck. Read more
items.author: Robin C

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Purple, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
